properties.areaDesc: Northern Valley; Daniels; Northern Phillips; Sheridan
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 17 at 4:35PM MST until January 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
...DANGEROUSLY COLD WIND CHILLS CONTINUING TONIGHT...

* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills
expected, as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory,
very cold wind chills expected, as low as 35 below zero.

* WHERE...Daniels, Sheridan, Northern Phillips and Northern
Valley Counties.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon MST Saturday. For
the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon Saturday to 11 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY
HazardType: Dangerously Cold Wind Chill, Wind Chill
